name: @ekscss/framework
description: Progressive CSS framework powered by ekscss
author: Max Milton <max@wearegenki.com>

scripts.build: xcss level1.xcss dist/level1.css --map && xcss level2.xcss dist/level2.css --map && xcss level3.xcss dist/level3.css --map
scripts.build__REMOVE_ME: xcss level1.xcss dist/level1.css --map; xcss level2.xcss dist/level2.css --map; xcss level3.xcss dist/level3.css --map
